Description: Parent epic: [EPIC] Web App (Batch Day, Labels, Freezer)
Parent epic: [EPIC] Mobile App (Scanner, Freezer, Notifications)
Parent epic: [EPIC] Pantry Check & Smart List

Summary: Batch Day wizard (Web) — plan → optimize → labels
Acceptance Criteria:
- Steps: targets → summary → optimize/print
- Errors handled
- State stored across refresh

Summary: Freezer view (Web) — list, filters, quick actions
Description: Grid/list of MealUnits with filters by state/location and quick actions.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Filter by state/location
- Quick actions thaw/consume/discard
- Badge for consume_by

Summary: Scan page (Web PWA) with camera + QR decode
Description: Web-based scanner using BarcodeDetector; offline queue with idempotency.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Works iOS/Android
- Offline queue → retries
- Posts to /v1/scan

Description: Collect browser push token; send to backend.
Add routes to nav; update hero with prep-to-freezer, QR labels, thaw reminders.
Native scanner page; quick action selector.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Fast scanning
- Haptics
- Retry on network error

Description: Mobile screens for freezer list and item detail.
Register device, handle thaw reminders, deep-link to item.
Implement optimizer with substitution clusters and leftovers target.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Returns cart <= max_stores
- Leftovers <=15% on seed

Description: Generate QR labels PDF; return presigned URL.
Validate and advance MealUnit states; emit events.
Compute consume_by windows and send push tasks.
Subtract pantry from demand; normalize units.
Create Ingredient, Product, RecipeIngredient, MealUnit, Label, SubstitutionRule, Event tables and indexes.
Enforce legal transitions via CHECK/app layer.
Bad rows, duplicate keys, partial failures.

Summary: CLI: create_data_plane.sh (S3, SQS DLQs, RDS, Redis)
CloudWatch alarms (p95, 5xx, DLQ depth, Lambda errors, RDS CPU)
